item.description:
The Brettl Hupfers Ski club is once again hosting their Summer Volleyball League on Wednesdays at Artesani park in Allston, June 1st -Aug 20th.

 

  BHSC Volleyball league

Free play / team assignment

& BASIC INSTRUCTION

June 1st and June 8th

 

regular season 

The regular season will last

From June 15th to August 17th.

 

Games will be at Artesani Park located off Soldiers Field Rd in Brighton, MA from 6:15 – 8:30 Wednesday Night

 

Championship Weekend - August 20th!  Details to Follow

Space is limited - Sign up now!

                          

 

Drills and Training

 

We will have a professional volleyball instructor to do drills and work on team skills.  Each group of 2 teams will work with the instructor for a 45 minute session.

  • Nets and Equipment will all be Tournament grade
  • Must be 21 Years of age
  • Minimum of 3 Men and 3 Women per team maximum of 8 players
  • Scoring will be Rally Point Style
  • Play the whole time  (No sitting out - No working)
  • Registration will be taken on a first come first serve basis
  • Players must play in at least half of the regular season games to be eligible to play in the playoffs
  • Teams must have a minimum  of 2 Men and 2 Women for games to count towards standings

Payment Options: (Individual Member or EICL $55)  (Individual Non-Member $60)

Deadline is June 14th - no refunds after June 15th

Payment by Check:

Please send Check Payable to: Brettl- Hupfers’ Ski and Sports Club                                           

Mail To: Brettl-Hupfers’ Ski and Sport Club

               C\O Mike Ryan

               7 Alaric Ter

               West Roxbury, MA 02132

 

Please Pay Via pay pal:

A.  Go to: www.paypal.com (create an account if you don't already have one - and no, you do not have to give them your bank account info to make a payment).
B.  Send Money to: brettl.hupfers@gmail.com add 3% if you are paying with a debit or credit card.  If your checking account is linked to paypal, no extra fees.
C.  Click "Personal" Click "Payment Owed"

D.  Please write in the subject field: Volleyball

For questions or concerns please contact Mike Ryan or Wendy Vargas at bh_vball@yahoo.com

 

Directions and Parking To Artesani Park 

From I-93 North or South and Boston

From Storrow Drive West follow signs reading "Newton/Arlington" (note Strorrow Drive Becomes Soldiers Field Road about 3 miles into the journey). You will come to a sign reading 'Arlington/Route 2 Fresh Pond Parkway and Newton.' At the Flashing yellow light just ahead of this sign, bear left. Go through a traffic signal 20 yards ahead.  Go ½ mile along Soldiers Field Road. Artesani Park is on the right, (follow signs for Publick Theatre).  The parking lot is diagonally across from WBZ and almost directly across from the Days Inn.

 

From the Massachusetts Turnpike

(I-90 East or West)

Take the Allston/Cambridge exit; head in the Cambridge direction. One light after the Doubletree Guest Suites and before crossing the River Street Bridge turn left onto the service road which parallels Storrow Drive and the river. Follow the signs for 'Newton/Arlington'. Go through the Western Avenue Traffic light 2/10 mile ahead. Go under the yellow overhead sign reading 'Danger Low Clearance - Cars only' and onto Soldiers Field Road. Go 1 mile to the yellow flashing light described in the directions above to Artesani Parking lot.

 

Public Transportation

From Central Square take the #70 bus (outbound to Waltham).

From Cleveland Circle take the #86 bus

(toward Cambridge).

From Harvard Square take the #86 bus

(toward Brookline)

 

Exit any of these buses at the corner of Western Avenue and Everett Street (382 Western Avenue). Then walk toward the Days Hotel and through the Hotel parking lot to Soldiers Field Road. Artesani Park is across the street.
item.how_to_find_us: Artesani Park located off Soldiers Field Rd in Brighton, MA from 6:15 – 8:30 Wednesday Nights
item.why: It's that time of year for bump, set, and spike! The Brettl Hupfers Ski club is once again hosting their Summer Volleyball League on Wednesdays at Artesani park in Allston, starting June 1st -Aug 20th. Hope to see you there!!
item.name: Outdoor Summer Volleyball League 2011
